EnemyInfo.Name: Bang
EnemyInfo.Description:
An orb that charges towards samus and absords all damage fired at it. Once it it is hit 6 times, it will explode and fire a projectile back at samu with the total damage of the previous 5 shots.
This enemy is three parts. The second part is the main part, so parameters are ignored for the other parts. The parts must be consecutive and in order.
This enemy has a bug where it doesn't decelerate correctly and instead instantly stops. it can be fixed by changing $A3BD3C : BNE $0A into BEQ $0A.
The speed table is located at $A3:BA84 (8 sets of words) Acceleration/Deceleration table is located at $A3:BC6A (13 pairs of words). The first in the pair is the frame divider for acceleration, the second is the divider for the deceleration.
The base acceleration is at $A3:BD75, and the decelerations is $A3:BDA5. Vanilla is 24.
When the enemy stops, it will wait $A3:BCB4 frames before moving again. Vanilla is 10 frames.
The enemy will stop charging in a direction if it off by a number of degrees set at $A3:BD11. Units are in 1/256th of a full circle. Vanilla is 3/16th of a rotation

Property.Name: Max Speed
Property.Description: Max move speed of the enemy. Only the second (main) part uses this value.

Property.Name: Acceleration
Property.Description: Acceleration and Deceleration frame divider. The larger the number, the slower the acceleration. Only the second (main) part uses this value.

Property.Name: Moves
Property.Description: Determines whether the enemy moves or not. Only the second (main) part uses this value.
